languages.text: "Тем болезненнее было ему осознать, что ни одна из сотворенных им мерзостей не была забыта {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}. Денз Беллардо боялся смерти и того, что ждет его после. Он надеялся искупить свои прегрешения. Жаждал убедить если не Императора, то хотя бы самого себя, что он не являлся на протяжении всей своей жизни лишь мыслящим пятнышком скверной плесени".

"It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."
languages.original_text: "Тем болезненнее было ему осознать, что ни одна из сотворенных им мерзостей не была забыта {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g}. Денз Беллардо боялся смерти и того, что ждет его после. Он надеялся искупить свои прегрешения. Жаждал убедить если не Императора, то хотя бы самого себя, что он не являлся на протяжении всей своей жизни лишь мыслящим пятнышком скверной плесени".

Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “更令他痛苦的是，他意识到，他犯下的那些令人发指的罪行，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}全都记得。丹兹·贝拉多害怕死亡，也害怕死亡之后等待他的事情。他希望能为他的罪行赎罪。他渴望证明，他的一生并不仅仅只是像恶性病毒一样活着，就算不是证明给帝皇看，也是证明给他自己看。”
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: “更令他痛苦的是，他意识到，他犯下的那些令人发指的罪行，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}全都记得。丹兹·贝拉多害怕死亡，也害怕死亡之后等待他的事情。他希望能为他的罪行赎罪。他渴望证明，他的一生并不仅仅只是像恶性病毒一样活着，就算不是证明给帝皇看，也是证明给他自己看。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Más le hirió el darse cuenta de que, de todos los actos crueles que cometió, ninguno fue olvidado por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Denz Bellardo temía a la muerte y a lo que le esperara después. Su esperanza era expiar sus fechorías; convencer, si no al Emperador, a sí mismo, al menos, de que a lo largo de su vida había sido algo más que una mota de malicia en movimiento».
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: «Más le hirió el darse cuenta de que, de todos los actos crueles que cometió, ninguno fue olvidado por el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Denz Bellardo temía a la muerte y a lo que le esperara después. Su esperanza era expiar sus fechorías; convencer, si no al Emperador, a sí mismo, al menos, de que a lo largo de su vida había sido algo más que una mota de malicia en movimiento».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「自分が犯したすべての凶悪な行為を{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はひとつも漏らさず把握していたと知った時、彼は一層苛まれました。デンツ・ベラルドは死と死後に彼を待ち受けているものを恐れていました。自分の悪行を償いたいと願っていました。自分は生涯をかけて悪行を重ねただけの、塵ほどの価値もない人間なんかではないと、皇帝は無理であっても自分自身を納得させたいと願っていました」
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: 「自分が犯したすべての凶悪な行為を{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はひとつも漏らさず把握していたと知った時、彼は一層苛まれました。デンツ・ベラルドは死と死後に彼を待ち受けているものを恐れていました。自分の悪行を償いたいと願っていました。自分は生涯をかけて悪行を重ねただけの、塵ほどの価値もない人間なんかではないと、皇帝は無理であっても自分自身を納得させたいと願っていました」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Umso schmerzhafter war für ihn die Erkenntnis, dass keine seiner verwerflichen Taten vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} vergessen worden war. Denz Bellardo fürchtete den Tod und das, was ihn danach erwarten würde. Er wollte Abbitte für seine Missetaten leisten. Er wollte wenn schon nicht den Imperator, dann wenigstens sich selbst davon überzeugen, dass er in seinem Leben mehr gewesen war als ein Fleck bösartigen Schimmels."
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: "Umso schmerzhafter war für ihn die Erkenntnis, dass keine seiner verwerflichen Taten vom {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} vergessen worden war. Denz Bellardo fürchtete den Tod und das, was ihn danach erwarten würde. Er wollte Abbitte für seine Missetaten leisten. Er wollte wenn schon nicht den Imperator, dann wenigstens sich selbst davon überzeugen, dass er in seinem Leben mehr gewesen war als ein Fleck bösartigen Schimmels."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Je vous laisse imaginer sa souffrance lorsqu'il a compris que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} n'avait pas pardonné le moindre de ses actes odieux. Denz Bellardo avait peur de la mort et de ce qui l'attendait ensuite. Il espérait racheter ses méfaits. Il était prêt à tout pour convaincre, si ce n'était l'Empereur, du moins lui-même, qu'il avait été plus qu'un simple germe de moisissure malveillante tout au long de sa vie. »
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous laisse imaginer sa souffrance lorsqu'il a compris que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} n'avait pas pardonné le moindre de ses actes odieux. Denz Bellardo avait peur de la mort et de ce qui l'attendait ensuite. Il espérait racheter ses méfaits. Il était prêt à tout pour convaincre, si ce n'était l'Empereur, du moins lui-même, qu'il avait été plus qu'un simple germe de moisissure malveillante tout au long de sa vie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "İşlediği korkunç günahların hiçbirini, bir tanesini bile {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} unutmadığını fark etmek, onun için daha da büyük bir acı kaynağıydı. Denz Bellardo, ölümden ve ölümden sonra onu bekleyen şeyden korkuyordu. Yanlışlarını telafi edebileceğini umuyordu. Ömrü boyunca kötülük peşindeki bilinç sahibi bir kemre olmadığı konusunda İmparator'u olmasa bile en azından kendini ikna etmeye çalışıyordu."
languages.original_text: "It was all the more painful for him to realise that, of all the heinous acts he had committed, not one had been forgotten by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. Denz Bellardo was afraid of death and that which would await him after. He hoped to atone for his misdeeds. Yearned to convince — if not the Emperor, then himself, at least — that he had been more than a conscious speck of malignant mould his entire life."

traits.locale_text: "İşlediği korkunç günahların hiçbirini, bir tanesini bile {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un unutmadığını fark etmek onun için daha da büyük bir acı kaynağıydı. Denz Bellardo ölümden ve ölümünün sonrasında onu bekleyen şeyden korkuyordu. Yanlışlarını telafi edebileceğini umuyordu. Kötülük peşindeki bilinç sahibi bir gübre parçası olmadığı konusunda ömrü boyunca İmparator'u olmasa bile en azından kendini ikna etmeye çalıştı."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
